jobs_results.title: Senior Product Development Manager - Sensory - Flavors
jobs_results.description:
POSITION INTRODUCTORY;

The Sr. Product Development Manager for Sensory & Flavors, requires creativity, in addition to an above-average sense of taste and smell. He / She to have a good memory for scents. Ability to combine essential oils, plant extracts and aroma chemicals to create both artificial and natural flavors.

Have the knowledge to conduct tests at the same time know / set up the processes of systematic testing in a laboratory environment on how flavors perform in various products. Engineer flavors that will end up in a variety of products.

RESPONSIBLITIES;
• Motivation, patience, and a willingness to experiment are also important. The Sr. Flavorist must have the ability to create/modify flavors.
• Provide timely responsiveness to ongoing testing enquiries and processes.
• Certified Flavorist with the ability to create aspiring flavors or the relevant experience.
• Keep track of all test results, comments and ensure that they are recorded without any errors.
• Ensure... proper data management is maintained in the database of the creations, ingredients, and supplies.
• Assist to resolve related issues where necessary.
• Provide knowledge support for product pricing, product costing etc.
• Attend to all matters pertaining to lab processes, testing procedures and results.
• Other related duties as assigned by Head of Flavors/Senior R&D Manager.

REQUIREMENTS;
• Bachelor's/Undergraduate degree/Diploma in any science discipline, food engineering, food science, chemistry, or biology with at least 6 years relevant working experience as Senior/Flavorist in any flavor industry
• Highly responsible and reliable with exceptional attention to details.
• Experience in working within tight deadlines independently in a fast pace environment.
• Able to maintain confidentiality for all work-related matters.
• Creativity and scientific proficiency with a sensitive and distinctive palette

jobs_results.title: Product Manager
jobs_results.description:
Job Responsibilities

• Responsible for the life cycle of end-to-end solution products, including video KYC(Know Your Customers) platform, DIV (Digital Identity Verification) platform, etc

• Work with executives and business line stakeholders to define the requirements and solve with product enhancement. Help prioritize and rank the solutions, develop business cases.

• Engage in product enhancement to develop and iterate MVPs, based on market research and stakeholders’ feedbacks.

• Organise and manage experts from engineers to create shared goals and specs for products.

• Ensure that deliverables are provided on-time and with quality

Job Requirements

• Bachelor‘s and above degree in Computer Science or any relevant discipline

• At least 3 years of experience in the Internet / technology industry

• Experience defining and developing a new product or service.

• Extensive knowledge in user interaction (UI) design and user experience (UX), with basic knowledge of technical... principles

• Knowledge in KYC, customer onboarding, anti fraud system experience perferred

• Experience in API integrations preferred

jobs_results.description: 1. General Management of a Cake Manufacturing facility.2. Be able to constantly look for ways to increase productivity and introduce machine to reduce labor cost

jobs_results.title: Product Manager | Regional Private Bank | Central, Singapore
jobs_results.description:
Job Description

You will be responsible for:
• Work closely with the Investment Products Team in Head Office, and be a part of a strong wealth management business franchise which services the banking needs of high net worth clients.
• Assist Head of Private Banking in providing strategic investment services, customized financial solutions and execution of the market trades covering bonds, equities, funds and structured products.
• Analyse business needs and competitors' trends, so as to issue business requirements in system enhancement projects that aim at offering a best-in-class trading platform in the market.
• Conduct the due diligence on new investment products and performance reviews of the existing ones in the product shelf, and be a contact person in driving the relationship with business counterparts.
• Assist the Head OfficeInvestment Products team to generate and distribute investment strategies, ideas and articulate investment concepts to RMs and respectively their high... net worth clients.
• Have an oversight on the dealing infrastructure / processes / systems for the investment products, and be responsible for all sales documentations, product agreements, and service level agreements.
• Liaise effectively with the respective stakeholders including the Head OfficeInvestment Products team, Technology, Operations, Compliance and Risk Management to ensure smooth operations processes.
• Identify changes in regional market practice and regulatory requirements to develop and improve systems, frameworks and tools
Requirements
• University graduate with 5to 7years of product manager experience in bonds, equities, funds or structured products.
• Sound understanding of economics, market practices and investment products in the wealth management business.
• Holder of the existing CMFAS certification (e.g. M1, M2, M5, M6, and M7) is a mandatory requirement of this job.
• Superior communication and organization skills, with the ability to interact with senior stakeholders, with good verbal and written communication skills in English. Fluency in Chinese is advantageous, as the job requires to communicate with key stakeholders in North Asia
• Excellent team player with strong interpersonal and communication skills to work well with all levels of counterparts.
• Willingness to work under a dynamic environment, multi-tasking with tight and short assignment / project deadlines.

Job Description You will be responsible for: * Work closely with the Investment Products Team in Head Office, and be a part of a strong wealth management business franchise which services the banking needs of high net worth clients. * Assist

Experience: 0.00-50.00 Years

jobs_results.title: Production Supervisor / Senior Production Supervisor
jobs_results.description:
Essential Duties and Responsibilities:
• Manage manufacturing operations activities of UCAP.
• In-charge of manpower planning within the production and ensure daily smooth operation of production
• Plan and deploy manpower according to products requirement.
• Ensure production and shipment is on time.
• Ensure quality standard of product.
• Cross training of employees across product group.
• Able to guide and lead the production team to meet OTD.
• Able to lead and resolve day to day line issues.
• Able to initial CIP to improve the line MLT and to improve the productivity.
• Responsible and support 5S and lean activities.
• Able to support ad-hoc activities as assigned by Supervisor.

Educational/Certification Requirement: List both minimum and preferred educational requirements. Also provide minimum and preferred designations (e.g. CPA) or certifications (e.g. AWS)
• Diploma / Bachelor’s Degree in Engineering

Experience Requirement:
• Minimum 6-8 years relevant experience in... production operations
• Good team management

jobs_results.title: Senior Product Manager (User Growth)
jobs_results.description:
Binance is the global blockchain company behind the world’s largest digital asset exchange by trading volume and users, serving a greater mission to accelerate cryptocurrency adoption and increase the freedom of money.

Are you looking to be a part of the most influential company in the blockchain industry and contribute to the crypto-currency revolution that is changing the world?

Responsibilities:
• Responsible for Binance product design and planning, draft PRD requirements and interactive documents, and design product roadmap
• Responsible for user feedback, product competition analysis, market research, and maintaining the product's competitive advantage
• Responsible for cross-functional and cross-department communication and coordination to ensure product quality and progress, and complete related product goals
• Support related business needs and achieves business goals with internal and external partners

Requirements:
• Full-time enrollment of bachelor’s degree or above... working experience in mainstream Internet companies is preferred
• More than 5 years + working experience in Internet products, experienced in independently product design and implementation of complicated business
• Systematic front-end product working experience is preferred, with deep sensitivity with data
• Good product design methodology, good at finding entry points in complex or new business, providing high-quality product prototypes, flowcharts, wireframes or other related solutions
• Experience in blockchain or digital currency would be a plus

jobs_results.title: Product Manager
jobs_results.description:
Product Manager location Eunos / Geylang / Paya Lebar, East. Job Type Full-Time.

Position title Product Manager, working location Kaki Bukit, Working Days 5 day, Monday to Friday, Working hours 8.30 am to 5.30pm, Salary $4,500-$5,500.

Product managers are responsible for guiding the success of a product and leading the cross-functional team that is responsible for improving it sets the strategy, roadmap, and feature definition for a product or product line. The position may also include marketing and recommending or contributing information in setting product pricing.

Job responsibilities provide the deep product expertise needed to lead the organization and make strategic product decisions. Analyze market and competitive conditions, laying out a product vision that is differentiated and delivers unique value based on customer demands.

Plan activities from strategic to tactical and provides important cross-functional leadership — most notably between engineering, marketing, sales... and support teams. Responsible for defining the release process and coordinating all of the activities required to bring the product to market.

Own the creative process of generating, developing, and curating new ideas. Develops the business case for new products, improvements to existing products, and business ventures. Ensure that feedback and requests are seamlessly integrated into their product planning and development processes. Prioritizes features by ranking them against the strategic goals and initiatives.

Required Experience and Knowledge. Minimum 4 years of relevant working experiences. IT Related Bachelor’s Degree. Attains certification in product management is an advantage. Has technical knowledge or relevant domain knowledge that deals with document/content management.

Demonstrated success in defining and launching products that meet and exceed business objectives. Excellent written and verbal communication skills. Excellent teamwork skills. Proven ability to influence cross-functional teams without formal authority. Someone with Estate Management or Facility Management background will have added advantage. Singaporean Only

jobs_results.title: Product Manager, APAC (Growth)
jobs_results.description:
As the Product Manager leading the Growth vertical for APAC across more than 10 different markets, you will be working on a variety of products that drives sustainable growth and retention. You will focus on boosting user acquisition and engagement as well as retention.
This is a newly created position as a result of a well-established consumer-facing product within the region. You will be a key player in driving influence and autonomy within a highly collaborative, fast-paced and flexible working environment. You will partner closely with Engineers, Designers, and other Product managers in a cross-functional agile teams.

What You'll Be Doing (ie. Job Duties):
• Develop the product vision, strategy and roadmap that drives business impact and user growth.
• Identify and execute on opportunities to optimize acquisition funnel and improve user onboarding
• Have a consumer-centric mindset and build user experiences in collaboration with the design team.
• Define metrics to measure the... health and success of your products and initiatives.
• Align with business stakeholders and other product teams to drive meaningful outcomes and ensure cohesive user experience.
• Lead product execution that will deliver against timelines and business objectives.
• Work closely with the engineering teams across products to build scalable and robust solutions.
• Keep abreast new trends in the industry as well as emerging technologies. Share and inspire teams to stay ahead of the curve.
Must-haves:
• Experience in building and scaling B2C products for growing markets
• Track record of developing product strategies and roadmaps, deriving insights from data and understanding high-level technical architectures.
• Consumer-centric mindset that will build delightful user experience with ability to collaborate with designers.
• Analytical and data-driven approach in decision making
• Solid experience leading agile teams, demonstrated influence in product leadership and able to drive product execution
• Comfortable to act, challenge the status quo and thrive in a fast-paced and dynamic environment and in a collaborative manner
• Comfortable with ambiguity and able to balance priorities.

For more information you can email Celestine Chia in our Singapore office at celestine.chia@teksystems.com quoting Job Reference 524342 or alternatively, apply here to register your interest.
http://jobs.en-sg.teksystems.com/wazx0N/product-manager-apac-growth-itcommunications-singapore-singapore-14575052

Allegis Group Singapore Pte Ltd, Company Reg No. 200909448N, EA Licence No. 10C4544

Technology

jobs_results.title: Product Manager
Manager, Product Technology Audit
jobs_results.description:
Get to know our Team :
• Internal Audit is an independent function within Grab that provides an objective assurance and advisory role to Grab’s senior management.
• We use a systematic, disciplined risk-based approach to evaluate and assess Grab’s risks, processes and internal controls.
• Reflecting Grab’s entrepreneurial spirit, Internal Audit covers multiple businesses and technology areas.

Get to know the Role :
• As a Manager of Technology Audit, you are responsible to effectively manage audits and risk advisory activities that cover the associated risks arising from Technology and System activities across the Grab’s businesses.
• You report directly to the Head of Technology, Systems & Data Analytics Audit, and work in a team of 4 technology auditors who are specialised in the audits of Technology and Systems related activities within the Grab’s businesses.
• We seek a candidate who brings excellent audit and risk advisory experience to complement the Technology Audit team, in a... fast-paced and dynamic environment.
• You effectively plan, manage and execute audits, including the design of audit work steps to evaluate the risks associated with governance, financial, operational, regulatory, and business continuity.

The day-to-day activities :
• Support the Head of Technology, Systems & Data Analytics Audit as part of the Technology Audit team.
• Work with the Technology Audit team and partner the other IA teams, focusing on all risks arising from the Technology and System activities across Grab’s businesses.
• Plan and perform risk-based assessments, understand and evaluate the business environment, related controls and processes.
• Prepare draft/ final report and participate in the presentation of audit findings.
• Develop and maintain business relations with Grab’s management, and be the trusted risk advisor on control related matters.

The must haves :
• Bachelor's degree in information systems, computer science/engineering, accountancy, finance or equivalent, with professional certification (e.g., CISA, CISM, CISSP) as an added advantage.
• 10-12 years of technology audit and risk advisory (including Sarbanes-Oxley) experience.
• Strong knowledge of technology regulatory requirements and expectations within South-East Asia.
• Excellent command of English.
• Proficiency in productivity tools (email, calendar, Word, Excel, PowerPoint).
• Located in Singapore, and ability to travel for work when required.

Experience and knowledge in the following:
• Excellent technology auditing skills, with strong confidence for interaction with stakeholders.
• Experience in auditing application security, cybersecurity domains and/or cloud computing will be an added advantage.
• Experience with the use of data analytics and visualisation tools for audit will be an added advantage
